reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Engaging lectures and fair exams. Dr. Thompson really knows how to make cell biology interesting!

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Brilliant teacher! His algorithms course was challenging but incredibly rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Decent course content, but lectures can be a bit dry. Appreciate the real-world examples though.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. O'Brien's passion for medieval history is contagious. Best class I've taken so far!

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Quantum mechanics made (somewhat) understandable. Dr. Yamamoto is patient and explains complex concepts well.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Moves too fast through material. Often seems annoyed when students ask questions.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Eye-opening course on social inequalities. Dr. Garcia encourages critical thinking and lively debates.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Solid grasp of organic chemistry, but can be inconsistent with grading. Lab sessions are well-organized.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Insightful analysis of current political systems. Dr. Ahmed brings a global perspective to the class.

reviews.subject: Engineering
reviews.review: Excellent at explaining complex engineering concepts. Always available for extra help.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Passionate about Victorian literature. Assignments are creative and thought-provoking.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Knowledgeable, but sometimes struggles to explain complex economic theories clearly.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Brown's lectures are like time travel through art. Absolutely fascinating and engaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Challenges students to think deeply. Discussions in this ethics course were always lively.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Inspiring teacher who makes you want to save the planet. Field trips were a highlight.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Interesting subject matter, but Prof. Ivanov can be a bit disorganized at times.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Cutting-edge research integrated into the curriculum. Dr. Taylor is clearly passionate about brain science.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Material is very difficult and Prof. Chang isn't always clear in his explanations.

reviews.subject: International Relations
reviews.review: Dr. Al-Rashid's firsthand diplomatic experience adds incredible value to the course. Highly recommended!

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Makes complex musical concepts accessible. Great balance of theory and practical application.
